participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative, introspective, and passionate about storytelling.
participant_1.background: My favorite things are playing with my friends, reading books, and eating ice cream. I enjoy relaxing in my free time by watching cartoons. I'm a writer, looking for a job to support myself while I work on my own stories. I work at a bookstore. I like the library.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Outgoing, friendly, and has a love for music and fashion.
participant_2.background: I drive a Subaru Outback because it's a practical car for getting to the lake and for carrying all my books. I love the peace and quiet of the suburbs, and I enjoy the fact that I can walk my dogs in the park without having to worry about traffic. I go to a catholic high school in new england. My favorite people are those who share my love of game shows and fashion. I was able to take a year off to pursue my music career.

content.text: Not much, just got home from school. How about you?
I'm doing well, just got done with some writing.
Oh, cool. What kind of writing do you do?
I'm a writer, so I write stories, poems, essays, etc.
That's really cool! I love to read. What's your favorite book?
It's hard to choose just one, but I'd say "The Great Gatsby" by F. Scott Fitzgerald is one of my favorites.
That's a great book! I love the setting and the characters.
Me too! It's a classic for a reason.
Have you read any other books by F. Scott Fitzgerald?
Yes, I've read "The Beautiful and Damned" and "Tender is the Night."
I've heard good things about those books. I'll have to check them out.
